Posts.Content: footprintsangel wrote:  Hi everyone my name is Debbie and I have stage3 IDuctal carcinoma and I have enjoyed learning from you nice people. I hope to learn more and keep up with all the ways to help myself and some friends I know. I  think that no one knows what we have been threw as much as people like you. I also have lymphedema from all the surgeries. But everyday is good and friends online are great! Thank for the help on my journey Luv, Debbie Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: I love your group footprintsangel footprintsangel
